name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The price of gold is at a record high. It’s so high that an angry mob looted Mr. T.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The CEO of Starbucks said that President Obama shouldn’t be vacationing during a crisis, and that he should be getting Americans back to work — so they can afford a $9 cup of coffee.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The White House is pointing out that all presidents take vacation. Teddy Roosevelt took trips to Long Island, Harry Truman would go to Key West, and George Bush would go to Legoland.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A brawl broke out during a Joe Biden speech in China. Apparently, someone was blocking the exit.
